scripts.test:coverage: nyc --check-coverage --lines 90 npm run test:unit && npm run report
scripts.test: npm run style && npm run test:unit && npm run test:int
scripts.test:unit:watch: npm run test:unit -s & chokidar 'src/**/*.js' 'test/**/*.spec.js' --polling -c "npm run test:unit -s"
scripts.test:int:watch: npm run test:int -s & chokidar 'src/**/*.js' 'test/**/*.int.js' --polling -c "npm run test:int -s"
scripts.test:watch: npm run test:coverage -s & chokidar 'src/**/*.js' 'test/**/*.spec.js' --polling -c "npm run test:coverage -s"
scripts.test:ci: npm run style && blue-tape test/**/**.spec.js | tap-xunit > xunit.xml && blue-tape test/**/**.int.js | tap-xunit > xunit.xml && npm run test:coverage && npm run report:ci
